54 template <typename Tile = Tensor<double, Eigen::aligned_allocator<double>>,
55  typename Policy = DensePolicy>
56 class DistArray : public madness::archive::ParallelSerializableObject {
57  public:
58  typedef DistArray<Tile, Policy> DistArray_;
59  typedef TiledArray::detail::ArrayImpl<Tile, Policy> impl_type;
60  typedef typename impl_type::policy_type policy_type;
61  typedef typename detail::numeric_type<Tile>::type
62  element_type;
63  typedef typename detail::scalar_type<Tile>::type
64  scalar_type;
65  typedef typename impl_type::trange_type trange_type;
66  typedef
67  typename impl_type::range_type range_type;
68  typedef typename impl_type::shape_type
69  shape_type;
70  typedef typename impl_type::range_type::index
71  index;
72  typedef typename impl_type::size_type size_type;
73  typedef typename impl_type::value_type value_type;
74  typedef
75  typename impl_type::eval_type eval_type;
76  typedef typename impl_type::reference future;
77  typedef typename impl_type::reference reference;
78  typedef
79  typename impl_type::const_reference const_reference;
80  typedef typename impl_type::iterator iterator;
81  typedef typename impl_type::const_iterator
82  const_iterator;
83  typedef typename impl_type::pmap_interface
84  pmap_interface;
85 
86  private:
87  std::shared_ptr<impl_type> pimpl_;
88 
89  static madness::AtomicInt cleanup_counter_;
90 
92 
96  static void lazy_deleter(const impl_type* const pimpl) {
97  if (pimpl) {
98  if (madness::initialized()) {
99  World& world = pimpl->world();
100  const madness::uniqueidT id = pimpl->id();
101  cleanup_counter_++;
102 
103  try {
104  world.gop.lazy_sync(id, [pimpl]() {
105  delete pimpl;
106  DistArray_::cleanup_counter_--;
107  });
108  } catch (madness::MadnessException& e) {
109  fprintf(stderr,
110  "!! ERROR TiledArray: madness::MadnessException thrown in "
111  "Array::lazy_deleter().\n"
112  "%s\n"
113  "!! ERROR TiledArray: The exception has been absorbed.\n"
114  "!! ERROR TiledArray: rank=%i\n",
115  e.what(), world.rank());
116 
117  cleanup_counter_--;
118  delete pimpl;
119  } catch (std::exception& e) {
120  fprintf(stderr,
121  "!! ERROR TiledArray: std::exception thrown in "
122  "Array::lazy_deleter().\n"
123  "%s\n"
124  "!! ERROR TiledArray: The exception has been absorbed.\n"
125  "!! ERROR TiledArray: rank=%i\n",
126  e.what(), world.rank());
127 
128  cleanup_counter_--;
129  delete pimpl;
130  } catch (...) {
131  fprintf(stderr,
132  "!! ERROR TiledArray: An unknown exception was thrown in "
133  "Array::lazy_deleter().\n"
134  "!! ERROR TiledArray: The exception has been absorbed.\n"
135  "!! ERROR TiledArray: rank=%i\n",
136  world.rank());
137 
138  cleanup_counter_--;
139  delete pimpl;
140  }
141  } else {
142  delete pimpl;
143  }
144  }
145  }
146 
148 
153  static std::shared_ptr<impl_type> init(World& world,
154  const trange_type& trange,
155  const shape_type& shape,
156  std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface> pmap) {
157  // User level validation of input
158 
159  if (!pmap) {
160  // Construct a default process map
161  pmap = Policy::default_pmap(world, trange.tiles_range().volume());
162  } else {
163  // Validate the process map
164  TA_USER_ASSERT(pmap->size() == trange.tiles_range().volume(),
165  "Array::Array() -- The size of the process map is not "
166  "equal to the number of tiles in the TiledRange object.");
167  TA_USER_ASSERT(
168  pmap->rank() == typename pmap_interface::size_type(world.rank()),
169  "Array::Array() -- The rank of the process map is not equal to that "
170  "of the world object.");
171  TA_USER_ASSERT(
172  pmap->procs() == typename pmap_interface::size_type(world.size()),
173  "Array::Array() -- The number of processes in the process map is not "
174  "equal to that of the world object.");
175  }
176 
177  // Validate the shape
178  TA_USER_ASSERT(!shape.empty(),
179  "Array::Array() -- The shape is not initialized.");
180  TA_USER_ASSERT(shape.validate(trange.tiles_range()),
181  "Array::Array() -- The range of the shape is not equal to "
182  "the tiles range.");
183 
184  return std::shared_ptr<impl_type>(new impl_type(world, trange, shape, pmap),
185  lazy_deleter);
186  }
187 
188  public:
190

196  DistArray() : pimpl_() {}

202  DistArray(const DistArray_& other) : pimpl_(other.pimpl_) {}

214  std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface>())
215  : pimpl_(init(world, trange, shape_type(1, trange), pmap)) {}

288  template <typename OtherTile,
289  typename = std::enable_if_t<not std::is_same<
290  DistArray_, DistArray<OtherTile, Policy>>::value>>
291  explicit DistArray(const DistArray<OtherTile, Policy>& other) : pimpl_() {
292  *this = foreach<Tile>(other, [](Tile& result, const OtherTile& source) {
293  result = TiledArray::Cast<Tile, OtherTile>{}(source);
294  });
295  }
296 
298 
304  template <typename OtherTile, typename Op>
305  DistArray(const DistArray<OtherTile, Policy>& other, Op&& op) : pimpl_() {
306  *this = foreach<Tile>(other, std::forward<Op>(op));
307  }

319  DistArray_ clone() const { return TiledArray::clone(*this); }

330  static void wait_for_lazy_cleanup(World& world, const double = 60.0) {
331  try {
332  world.await([&]() { return (cleanup_counter_ == 0); }, true);
333  } catch (...) {
334  printf("%i: Array lazy cleanup timeout with %i pending cleanup(s)\n",
335  world.rank(), int(cleanup_counter_));
336  throw;
337  }
338  }
339 
341 
343  void wait_for_lazy_cleanup() const {
344  DistArray::wait_for_lazy_cleanup(world());
345  }

352  pimpl_ = other.pimpl_;
353 
354  return *this;
355  }

512 
515  void fill_local(const element_type& value = element_type(),
516  bool skip_set = false) {
517  init_tiles(
518  [value](const range_type& range) { return value_type(range, value); },
519  skip_set);
520  }
521 
523 
526  void fill(const element_type& value = element_type(), bool skip_set = false) {
527  fill_local(value, skip_set);
528  }
529 
533  void fill_random(bool skip_set = false) {
534  init_elements(
535  [](const auto&) { return (element_type)std::rand() / RAND_MAX; });
536  }
537 
539 
569  template <typename Op>
570  void init_tiles(Op&& op, bool skip_set = false) {
571  check_pimpl();
572 
573  auto it = pimpl_->pmap()->begin();
574  const auto end = pimpl_->pmap()->end();
575  for (; it != end; ++it) {
576  const auto index = *it;
577  if (!pimpl_->is_zero(index)) {
578  if (skip_set) {
579  auto fut = find(index);
580  if (fut.probe()) continue;
581  }
582  Future<value_type> tile = pimpl_->world().taskq.add(
583  [](DistArray_* array, const size_type index,
584  const Op& op) -> value_type {
585  return op(array->trange().make_tile_range(index));
586  },
587  this, index, op);
588  set(index, tile);
589  }
590  }
591  }
592 
594 
611  template <typename Op>
612  void init_elements(Op&& op, bool skip_set = false) {
613  init_tiles([op](const TiledArray::Range& range) -> value_type {
614  // Initialize the tile with the given range object
615  Tile tile(range);
616 
617  // Initialize tile elements
618  for (auto& idx : range) tile[idx] = op(idx);
619 
620  return tile;
621  });
622  }
623

659 
662  TiledArray::expressions::TsrExpr<const DistArray_, true> operator()(
663  const std::string& vars) const {
664 #ifndef NDEBUG
665  const unsigned int n =
666  1u + std::count_if(vars.begin(), vars.end(),
667  [](const char c) { return c == ','; });
668  if (bool(pimpl_) && n != pimpl_->trange().tiles_range().rank()) {
669  if (TiledArray::get_default_world().rank() == 0) {
670  TA_USER_ERROR_MESSAGE(
671  "The number of array annotation variables is not equal to the "
672  "array dimension:"
673  << "\n number of variables = " << n
674  << "\n array dimension = "
675  << pimpl_->trange().tiles_range().rank());
676  }
677 
678  TA_EXCEPTION(
679  "The number of array annotation variables is not equal to the array "
680  "dimension.");
681  }
682 #endif // NDEBUG
683  return TiledArray::expressions::TsrExpr<const DistArray_, true>(*this,
684  vars);
685  }
686 
688 
691  TiledArray::expressions::TsrExpr<DistArray_, true> operator()(
692  const std::string& vars) {
693 #ifndef NDEBUG
694  const unsigned int n =
695  1u + std::count_if(vars.begin(), vars.end(),
696  [](const char c) { return c == ','; });
697  if (bool(pimpl_) && n != pimpl_->trange().tiles_range().rank()) {
698  if (TiledArray::get_default_world().rank() == 0) {
699  TA_USER_ERROR_MESSAGE(
700  "The number of array annotation variables is not equal to the "
701  "array dimension:"
702  << "\n number of variables = " << n
703  << "\n array dimension = "
704  << pimpl_->trange().tiles_range().rank());
705  }
706 
707  TA_EXCEPTION(
708  "The number of array annotation variables is not equal to the array "
709  "dimension.");
710  }
711 #endif // NDEBUG
712  return TiledArray::expressions::TsrExpr<DistArray_, true>(*this, vars);
713  }

831  void swap(DistArray_& other) { std::swap(pimpl_, other.pimpl_); }
832 
834  void make_replicated() {
835  check_pimpl();
836  if ((!pimpl_->pmap()->is_replicated()) && (world().size() > 1)) {
837  // Construct a replicated array
838  auto pmap = std::make_shared<detail::ReplicatedPmap>(world(), size());
839  DistArray_ result = DistArray_(world(), trange(), shape(), pmap);
840 
841  // Create the replicator object that will do an all-to-all broadcast of
842  // the local tile data.
843  auto replicator =
844  std::make_shared<detail::Replicator<DistArray_>>(*this, result);
845 
846  // Put the replicator pointer in the deferred cleanup object so it will
847  // be deleted at the end of the next fence.
848  TA_ASSERT(replicator.unique()); // Required for deferred_cleanup
849  madness::detail::deferred_cleanup(world(), replicator);
850 
851  DistArray_::operator=(result);
852  }
853  }
854 
856 
858  void truncate() { TiledArray::truncate(*this); }
859

864  bool is_initialized() const { return static_cast<bool>(pimpl_); }

867 
871  template <typename Archive,
872  typename = std::enable_if_t<
873  !Archive::is_parallel_archive &&
874  madness::archive::is_output_archive<Archive>::value>>
875  void serialize(const Archive& ar) const {
876  // serialize array type, world size, rank, and pmap type to be able
877  // to ensure same data type and same data distribution expected
878  ar& typeid(*this).hash_code() & world().size() & world().rank() & trange() &
879  shape() & typeid(pmap().get()).hash_code();
880  int64_t count = 0;
881  for (auto it = begin(); it != end(); ++it) ++count;
882  ar& count;
883  for (auto it = begin(); it != end(); ++it) ar & it->get();
884  }
885 
887 
891  template <typename Archive,
892  typename = std::enable_if_t<
893  !Archive::is_parallel_archive &&
894  madness::archive::is_input_archive<Archive>::value>>
895  void serialize(const Archive& ar) {
896  auto& world = TiledArray::get_default_world();
897 
898  std::size_t typeid_hash = 0l;
899  ar& typeid_hash;
900  if (typeid_hash != typeid(*this).hash_code())
901  TA_EXCEPTION(
902  "DistArray::serialize: source DistArray type != this DistArray type");
903 
904  ProcessID world_size = -1;
905  ProcessID world_rank = -1;
906  ar& world_size& world_rank;
907  if (world_size != world.size() || world_rank != world.rank())
908  TA_EXCEPTION(
909  "DistArray::serialize: source DistArray world != this DistArray "
910  "world");
911 
912  trange_type trange;
913  shape_type shape;
914  ar& trange& shape;
915 
916  // use default pmap, ensure it's the same pmap used to serialize
917  auto volume = trange.tiles_range().volume();
918  auto pmap = detail::policy_t<DistArray_>::default_pmap(world, volume);
919  size_t pmap_hash_code = 0;
920  ar& pmap_hash_code;
921  if (pmap_hash_code != typeid(pmap.get()).hash_code())
922  TA_EXCEPTION(
923  "DistArray::serialize: source DistArray pmap != this DistArray pmap");
924  pimpl_.reset(
925  new impl_type(world, std::move(trange), std::move(shape), pmap));
926 
927  int64_t count = 0;
928  ar& count;
929  for (auto it = begin(); it != end(); ++it, --count) {
930  Tile tile;
931  ar& tile;
932  this->set(it.ordinal(), std::move(tile));
933  }
934  if (count != 0)
935  TA_EXCEPTION(
936  "DistArray::serialize: # of tiles in archive != # of tiles expected");
937  }
938 
941 
950  template <typename Archive>
951  void load(World& world, Archive& ar) {
952  auto me = world.rank();
953  const Tag tag = world.mpi.unique_tag(); // for broadcasting metadata
954 
955  if (ar.dofence()) world.gop.fence();
956 
957  if (ar.is_io_node()) { // on each io node ...
958 
959  auto& localar = ar.local_archive();
960 
961  // make sure source data matches the expected type
962  // TODO would be nice to be able to convert the data upon reading
963  std::size_t typeid_hash = 0l;
964  localar& typeid_hash;
965  if (typeid_hash != typeid(*this).hash_code())
966  TA_EXCEPTION(
967  "DistArray::load: source DistArray type != this DistArray type");
968 
969  // make sure same number of clients for every I/O node
970  int num_io_clients = 0;
971  localar& num_io_clients;
972  if (num_io_clients != ar.num_io_clients())
973  TA_EXCEPTION("DistArray::load: invalid parallel archive");
974 
975  trange_type trange;
976  shape_type shape;
977  localar& trange& shape;
978 
979  // send trange and shape to every client
980  for (ProcessID p = 0; p < world.size(); ++p) {
981  if (p != me && ar.io_node(p) == me) {
982  world.mpi.Send(int(1), p, tag); // Tell client to expect the data
983  madness::archive::MPIOutputArchive dest(world, p);
984  dest& trange& shape;
985  dest.flush();
986  }
987  }
988 
989  // use default pmap
990  auto volume = trange.tiles_range().volume();
991  auto pmap = detail::policy_t<DistArray_>::default_pmap(world, volume);
992  pimpl_.reset(
993  new impl_type(world, std::move(trange), std::move(shape), pmap));
994 
995  int64_t count = 0;
996  localar& count;
997  for (size_t ord = 0; ord != volume; ++ord) {
998  if (!is_zero(ord)) {
999  auto owner_rank = pmap->owner(ord);
1000  if (ar.io_node(owner_rank) == me) {
1001  Tile tile;
1002  localar& tile;
1003  this->set(ord, std::move(tile));
1004  --count;
1005  }
1006  }
1007  }
1008  if (count != 0)
1009  TA_EXCEPTION(
1010  "DistArray::load: # of tiles in archive != # of tiles expected");
1011  } else { // non-I/O node still needs to initialize metadata
1012 
1013  trange_type trange;
1014  shape_type shape;
1015 
1016  ProcessID p = ar.my_io_node();
1017  int flag;
1018  world.mpi.Recv(flag, p, tag);
1019  TA_ASSERT(flag == 1);
1020  madness::archive::MPIInputArchive source(world, p);
1021  source& trange& shape;
1022 
1023  // use default pmap
1024  auto volume = trange.tiles_range().volume();
1025  auto pmap = detail::policy_t<DistArray_>::default_pmap(world, volume);
1026  pimpl_.reset(
1027  new impl_type(world, std::move(trange), std::move(shape), pmap));
1028  }
1029 
1030  if (ar.dofence()) world.gop.fence();
1031  }
1032 
1034 
1042  template <typename Archive>
1043  void store(Archive& ar) const {
1044  auto me = world().rank();
1045 
1046  if (ar.dofence()) world().gop.fence();
1047 
1048  if (ar.is_io_node()) { // on each io node ...
1049  auto& localar = ar.local_archive();
1050  // ... store metadata first ...
1051  localar& typeid(*this).hash_code() & ar.num_io_clients() & trange() &
1052  shape();
1053  // ... then loop over tiles and dump the data from ranks
1054  // assigned to this I/O node in order ...
1055  // for sanity check dump tile count assigned to this I/O node
1056  const auto volume = trange().tiles_range().volume();
1057  int64_t count = 0;
1058  for (size_t ord = 0; ord != volume; ++ord) {
1059  if (!is_zero(ord)) {
1060  const auto owner_rank = pmap()->owner(ord);
1061  if (ar.io_node(owner_rank) == me) {
1062  ++count;
1063  }
1064  }
1065  }
1066  localar& count;
1067  for (size_t ord = 0; ord != volume; ++ord) {
1068  if (!is_zero(ord)) {
1069  auto owner_rank = pmap()->owner(ord);
1070  if (ar.io_node(owner_rank) == me) localar& find(ord).get();
1071  }
1072  }
1073  } // am I an I/O node?
1074  if (ar.dofence()) world().gop.fence();
1075  }
1076 
1078 
1083  static void register_set_notifier(
1084  std::function<void(const impl_type&, int64_t)> notifier = {}) {
1085  impl_type::set_notifier_accessor() = notifier;
1086  }
1087 
1088  private:
1089  template <typename Index>
1090  typename std::enable_if<std::is_integral<Index>::value>::type check_index(
1091  const Index i) const {
1092  check_pimpl();
1093  TA_USER_ASSERT(
1094  pimpl_->tiles_range().includes(i),
1095  "The ordinal index used to access an array tile is out of range.");
1096  }
1097 
1098  template <typename Index>
1099  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_integral<Index>::value>::type check_index(
1100  const Index& i) const {
1101  check_pimpl();
1102  TA_USER_ASSERT(
1103  pimpl_->tiles_range().includes(i),
1104  "The coordinate index used to access an array tile is out of range.");
1105  TA_USER_ASSERT(i.size() == pimpl_->trange().tiles_range().rank(),
1106  "The number of elements in the coordinate index does not "
1107  "match the dimension of the array.");
1108  }
1109 
1110  template <typename Index1>
1111  void check_index(const std::initializer_list<Index1>& i) const {
1112  check_index<std::initializer_list<Index1>>(i);
1113  }
1114 
1116  void check_pimpl() const {
1117  TA_USER_ASSERT(pimpl_,
1118  "The Array has not been initialized, likely reason: it was "
1119  "default constructed and used.");
1120  }
1121 
1122 }; // class DistArray
1123 
1124 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
1125 madness::AtomicInt DistArray<Tile, Policy>::cleanup_counter_;
1126 
1127 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_HEADER_ONLY
1128 
1129 extern template class DistArray<
1130  Tensor<double, Eigen::aligned_allocator<double>>, DensePolicy>;
1131 extern template class DistArray<Tensor<float, Eigen::aligned_allocator<float>>,
1132  DensePolicy>;
1133 extern template class DistArray<Tensor<int, Eigen::aligned_allocator<int>>,
1134  DensePolicy>;
1135 extern template class DistArray<Tensor<long, Eigen::aligned_allocator<long>>,
1136  DensePolicy>;
1137 // extern template
1138 // class DistArray<Tensor<std::complex<double>,
1139 // Eigen::aligned_allocator<std::complex<double> > >, DensePolicy>; extern
1140 // template class DistArray<Tensor<std::complex<float>,
1141 // Eigen::aligned_allocator<std::complex<float> > >, DensePolicy>
1142 
1143 extern template class DistArray<
1144  Tensor<double, Eigen::aligned_allocator<double>>, SparsePolicy>;
1145 extern template class DistArray<Tensor<float, Eigen::aligned_allocator<float>>,
1146  SparsePolicy>;
1147 extern template class DistArray<Tensor<int, Eigen::aligned_allocator<int>>,
1148  SparsePolicy>;
1149 extern template class DistArray<Tensor<long, Eigen::aligned_allocator<long>>,
1150  SparsePolicy>;
1151 // extern template
1152 // class DistArray<Tensor<std::complex<double>,
1153 // Eigen::aligned_allocator<std::complex<double> > >, SparsePolicy>; extern
1154 // template class DistArray<Tensor<std::complex<float>,
1155 // Eigen::aligned_allocator<std::complex<float> > >, SparsePolicy>;
1156 
1157 #endif // TILEDARRAY_HEADER_ONLY
1158 
1160 
1169 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
1170 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os,
1171  const DistArray<Tile, Policy>& a) {
1172  if (a.world().rank() == 0) {
1173  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < a.size(); ++i)
1174  if (!a.is_zero(i)) {
1175  const typename DistArray<Tile, Policy>::value_type tile =
1176  a.find(i).get();
1177  os << i << ": " << tile << "\n";
1178  }
1179  }
1180  a.world().gop.fence();
1181  return os;
1182 }
1183 
1184 } // namespace TiledArray

1186 // serialization
1187 namespace madness {
1188 namespace archive {
1189 template <class Tile, class Policy>
1190 struct ArchiveLoadImpl<ParallelInputArchive,
1191  TiledArray::DistArray<Tile, Policy>> {
1192  static inline void load(const ParallelInputArchive& ar,
1193  TiledArray::DistArray<Tile, Policy>& x) {
1194  x.load(*ar.get_world(), ar);
1195  }
1196 };
1197 
1198 template <class Tile, class Policy>
1199 struct ArchiveStoreImpl<ParallelOutputArchive,
1200  TiledArray::DistArray<Tile, Policy>> {
1201  static inline void store(const ParallelOutputArchive& ar,
1202  const TiledArray::DistArray<Tile, Policy>& x) {
1203  x.store(ar);
1204  }
1205 };
1206 } // namespace archive
1207 
1208 template <class Tile, class Policy>
1209 void save(const TiledArray::DistArray<Tile, Policy>& x,
1210  const std::string name) {
1211  archive::ParallelOutputArchive ar2(x.world(), name.c_str(), 1);
1212  ar2& x;
1213 }
1214 
1215 template <class Tile, class Policy>
1216 void load(TiledArray::DistArray<Tile, Policy>& x, const std::string name) {
1217  archive::ParallelInputArchive ar2(x.world(), name.c_str(), 1);
1218  ar2& x;
1219 }
